@NevSchulman @HeforShe Just listen. Really listen. Put down all devices and turn off all screens, sit in a silent room and just listen!
@HeforShe @NevSchulman this is the toughest, so common you need family or a partner & so often you could need space from that same person!
@HeforShe promoting crucial conversation. The myth that men/anyone for that matter just 'copes' is created by a lack of public recognition!
